rows.label: qst702408_msg0002
rows.name:
How about it, then? We're keeping the
gardens nice and tidy, aren't we? A
labor of love for me and my dad!

rows.label: qst702408_msg0003
rows.name:
You know, it's funny. I never used to
think very much of this place, me. Never
thought it was anything special.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0004
rows.name:
But that all changed when I saw the
old man busting a gut to fix this
place up after it got wrecked.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0005
rows.name:
So if I ever see that Grail oaf
round here again, I'll feed him a
knuckle sandwich, see if I don't!

rows.label: qst702408_msg0006
rows.name:
Uh? You want me to put my
money where my mouth is
and join the militia?

rows.label: qst702408_msg0007
rows.name:
Wow, you don't beat around the
bush... But since it's you asking...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0008
rows.name:
Right, well, I *do* feel like I wanna
repay you guys, and I *would* love to
give that bloody Grail a bloody nose...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0009
rows.name:
But on the other hand, working
here in these gardens is
also important to me...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0010
rows.name:
Ugh, hold up. If I was gonna
leave, does that mean I'd have
to persuade my old man first?!

rows.label: qst702408_msg0011
rows.name:
Urk... I'm not looking
forward to that... He'll
bash me up proper, I bet...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0012
rows.name:
Sorry to keep you hanging, but
do you think I could have a bit
longer to think about it?

rows.label: qst702408_msg0013
rows.name:
If I decide to take the plunge, and by
some miracle manage to convince Dad not
to kill me, I'll report to the camp.

rows.label: qst702408_msg0101
rows.name:
I'd like to think of myself as
a proper adult, and I know I
should stick to my duties...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0102
rows.name:
But I also want to chuck in the whole
gardening gig and leave the old man to
it... But if I say that to HIM...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0103
rows.name:
It probably won't end with just one
knuckle sandwich for me, and most
likely not just two, either...

rows.label: qst702408_msg0104
rows.name:
Anyway, I'll let you know what I
decide. Just give me some more time!
